title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 16 January 2013 - XWiki
content:
<sdumitriu> has quit  
04:07 <tekzilla> has quit  
04:09 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
04:31 <cjd> has quit  
04:31 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
04:31 <cjd> is now known as <Guest84374>  
06:01 <Denis2> has joined #xwiki  
06:04 <Denis> has quit  
06:36 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
07:50 <polx> has quit  
07:54 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:56 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:15 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
09:27 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
09:33 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
09:42 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
09:57 <tdelafosse> has joined #xwiki  
10:02 <GuillaumeF> has joined #xwiki  
10:08 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
10:15 <vmassol> tmortagne: good morning  
10:16 <vmassol> do you think you could work on http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-8461 since it's one of the blockers?  
10:16 <vmassol> or maybe it's fixed now?  
10:18 <tmortagne> vmassol: you won't get XWIKI-8461 anymore as long as you indicate the previous UI, waiting mflorea to close XWIKI-8687 to reduce it's priority  
10:19 <tmortagne> adding a comment  
10:19 <vmassol> sburjan`: were you able to test the new merge with an old version upgrade?  
10:21 <tmortagne> as for XWIKI-8252, it's blocked by XWIKI-8650, see my mail on the dev mailing list about it  
10:22 <tmortagne> current preparing a proposal for XCOMMONS-304  
10:25 <vmassol> tmortagne: why is http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-8252 not a blocker anymore?  
10:26 <tmortagne> vmassol: never been one AFAIK  
10:26 <vmassol> I thought it was listed by sorin  
10:27 <vmassol> it is  
10:27 <vmassol> see my mail "see my mail on the dev mailing list about it"  
10:27 <vmassol> oops  
10:27 <vmassol> "Issues to fix for 4.X cycle/4.5 final and assignments"  
10:28 <tmortagne> sure and that's why I worked on it but I don't know why it's not marked as blocker  
10:28 <vmassol> setting as blocker  
10:42 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
10:42 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:52 <Guest84374> has quit  
10:53 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
10:54 <cjd> is now known as <Guest94316>  
11:09 <GuillaumeF1> has joined #xwiki  
11:13 <GuillaumeF> has quit  
11:15 <sburjan> good morning  
11:17 <sburjan> vmassol: I have a short question. I really find useful the maven xar module for formatting, verifying and building a xar file. One thing I notice is that XWiki exports pages in a very wrong way according to what the XAR plugin consideres valid. For example: Content Author must be [xwiki:XWiki.Admin] but was [XWiki.Admin]  
11:18 <sburjan> should we fix this in export also ? so we get more valid page out of the export ?  
11:19 <GuillaumeF1> has quit  
11:20 <vmassol> sburjan: not sure  
11:20 <vmassol> for ex if we put the absolute user name then if the user imports in a local wiki and if he wants to user to the Admin user loccally  
11:21 <vmassol> this is a topic that needs to be discussed on the devs list I think, you could open a jira or better send an email about it  
11:21 <sburjan> I don't have an opinion about it, it just felt more logical, but now that you tell me this, yes, it's a hard topic  
11:32 <vmassol> jvdrean: http://ci.xwiki.org/view/Platform/job/xwiki-platform/ is still failing, please fix it asap we cannot have the build failing for so long  
11:33 <GuillaumeF> has joined #xwiki  
11:37 <jvdrean> vmassol: I'll fix it in less than 2 hours  
11:37 <vmassol> this is bad too: http://ci.xwiki.org/view/Functional%20Tests/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/  
11:37 <vmassol> consistent failing since the 10th  
11:38 <vmassol> same here: http://ci.xwiki.org/view/Functional%20Tests/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-extension/  
12:33 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki

12:41 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
12:53 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki

13:07 <cjd> has joined #xwiki

13:26 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
13:38 <tillo> has quit  
13:57 <tillo> has joined #xwiki  
14:01 <Guest57397> has quit  
14:01 <cjd\_> has joined #xwiki  
14:02 <jvdrean> has quit  
14:03 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
14:44 <msmeria> has quit  
14:45 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
15:06 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
15:06 <msmeria> has quit  
15:06 <cjd\_> has quit  
15:25 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
15:45 <sburjan> vmassol: projects in contrib which don't have a jira project associated, don't require a JIRA issue, right ?  
15:53 <tmortagne> sburjan: all contrib project make there own rule but you can create an issue in the contrib jira project and associate proper component  
15:53 <tmortagne> or ask to ad a new component if none exist for the project you are targetting  
15:53 <sburjan> tmortagne: since I don't h ave  yet a component, I guess I won't need a jira issue  
15:53 <sburjan> I am about to commit VM creation module (still very early dev)  
15:54 <tmortagne> sburjan: again contrib projects do what they want, there is no defined rule you should see with the contrib author  
15:54 <sburjan> I am the author :)  
15:54 <tmortagne> then it's your call  
15:55 <vmassol> it's a best practice to have jira and components and versions  
15:55 <tmortagne> I would say it depends is the project has releases or not  
15:55 <tmortagne> if you did not do any release yet then a jira issue is not really helpful  
15:56 <vmassol> sburjan: I'm creating a version + a component for you  
15:56 <vmassol> you always need to do a release IMO  
15:56 <tmortagne> except for the initial one probably  
15:56 <vmassol> sburjan: what' sthe name of your project?  
15:56 <sburjan> vmassol: thanks. No, I never did a release, it's only starting to be useful, but I want to commit my code to be safe. So don't think production ready yet, It's not even 100% implemented  
15:57 <sburjan> vmassol: the contrib name of my project is xwiki-enterprise-vagrant  
15:57 <vmassol> ok vagrant it is then  
15:57 <sburjan> https://github.com/xwiki-contrib/xwiki-enterprise-vagrant  
15:57 <vmassol> done  
15:57 <sburjan> but I am not 100% if it's place in platform will be in xwiki-enterprise  
15:57 <sburjan> ok, creating a jira issue  
15:57 <vmassol> sburjan: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XCONTRIB/component/12651  
15:58 <vmassol> you have a fixfor "Vagrant 1.0"  
16:00 <sburjan> ok, so now we are at version 1.0 which is unreleased. all my future commits will be with fixFor=1.0" until we do a release, right ?  
16:01 <tmortagne> sburjan: until you do a release ;)  
16:01 <sburjan> yes :)  
16:01 <sburjan> we'll get there too :P  
16:06 <evalica> has quit  
16:18 <vmassol> AndreasJonsson: ping  
16:29 <sburjan> vmassol: committed. Now writing the mail on devlist to announce and ask for code critique :)  
16:57 <msmeria> has quit  
17:05 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
17:05 <sdumitriu> has quit  
17:13 <cjd> has joined #xwiki

17:54 <sdumitriu1> vmassol: Any more feedback on http://markmail.org/message/bfkzhbiteghihf4n ?  
17:58 <tmortagne> sdumitriu1: would be cool to have your POV on http://markmail.org/message/ml2q6jweeg25u663  
17:59 <sdumitriu1> tmortagne: K  
17:59 <tmortagne> thanks  
17:59 <Enygma`> has quit  
18:07 <sburjan> has quit  
18:14 <vmassol> sburjan`: now that tmortagne/mflorea have fixed the merge issue could you retest by migratin an old XWiki into a 4.5-SNAPSHOT?  
18:14 <vmassol> (after the CI build is finished)  
18:14 <tmortagne> yep, there was many pages it's possible we forgot one use case  
18:18 <vmassol> sburjan`: if it works then maybe we could do the 4.5M1 release tomorrow
